topic: BELOVED: Finding Happiness in Marriage (Program Overview)
source_reference: BELOVED: Finding Happiness in Marriage (Program Overview)
author: Unknown
content_detailed:
- summary: A video-based enrichment program exploring the true meaning of the Sacrament of Marriage.
- approach: Uses Scripture, Tradition, and Church teaching to reveal the wonder, mystery, and joy behind the marriage commitment.
- goal: Aims to help couples discover the deepest spiritual, emotional, and practical realities of their marriage.
- format: Presented as a 6-session DVD set with Couple’s and Leader’s Guides.
content_summary: - summary: A video-based enrichment program exploring the true meaning of the Sacrament of Marriage....
